actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide that the park referred to as the East Lake Park located within the West Point Lake project on the Chattahoochee River, Ga., shall hereafter be known and designated as the "R. Schaefer Heard Park".

summary.text: Renames East Lake Park, located within the West Point Lake project on the Chattahoochee River, Georgia, as R. Shaefer Heard Park.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the park referred to as the East Lake Park located within the West Point Lake project on the Chattahoochee River, Ga., shall hereafter be known and designated as the "R. Schaefer Heard Park".
